title: Prewired Intrusion Alarms, Picnic Areas
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 30', 'OR Text', '30', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 741 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Live inspired.', 'That’s our mantra here at Sunstone, and it just means that we believe life should be lived in abundance – full, big, and with intention.', 'In honor of that, we blend an elevated living experience with an easy-going, relaxed atmosphere that encourages you to live life the way you live life.', 'Period.', 'Settle into one of our one, two, or three-bedroom apartment homes and discover what a life of abundance really means.', 'Features:', 'Ceiling Fans, Homes WiFi ready with pre-installed modem and 1st month free, provided by Cox., Disability Access*, Designer Plumbing Package*, Newly Remodeled Interiors, Vaulted Ceilings*, Premium Flooring*, Prewired Intrusion Alarms, Highly-Efficient Central A/C, Spacious Floor Plans, Designer Lighting Package*, Full-Size Washer and Dryer, Oversized Closets', '*Restrictions apply.', 'See Sales Associate for details.', 'Community Amenities:', 'Covered Parking, Individual Private Garages*, Picnic Areas, Media Lounge with Free WiFi, 24-Hour Fitness Center, 24-Hour Maintenance, Sparkling Swimming Pool & Relaxing Spa, Gas Grilling Stations, Gated Community with Controlled Access, Amazon Hub Lockers, We Love Pets!*, Minutes from Downtown, Shopping Centers and Entertainment', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'dzuYBF3F']
